sentences.sContent: ...the company that made a name for itself as an early entrant in the digital video-recorder market.
sentences.sCn: …这个以数码录像机市场的早期进入者而享有名气的公司。

synos.tran: 进入者；新会员；参加竞赛者；新工作者

words.tran: 使人入神的；令人欣喜的

trans.tranOther: An entrant is a person or company who has recently become a member of an institution or market
